text: Hit Parade of 1941 is a 1940 American musical comedy movie directed by John H. Auer and starring Kenny Baker, Frances Langford, Hugh Herbert, Ann Miller, Patsy Kelly, Mary Boland. It was distributed by Republic Pictures and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1941. ==Other websites== * Category:1940 comedy movies Category:1940 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies directed by John H. Auer
title: Hit Parade of 1941
